title: my client will not open..
body: I dont know what happened but i logged on a couple weeks ago no issue and i tried to open my client and it will not let me opened it. It said windows will close the program...idk whats happening right now

replies.body:
It sounds a lot like League may not be able to open due to some missing system permissions that prevent it from interacting with some necessary files. I recommend taking a look at our [permissions guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) for some common solutions to this.

Let me know if you still have issues after working through those steps.
pvp.net patcher kernel has stopped working??
